src_original: evaṃ śāśvatocchedādidurdṛṣṭayo 'panītā bhavanti // Phv_5 //

src_original: atra dvau ślokau bhavataḥ -

src_original: ya ucchedaṃ prakalpayatyatisūkṣme 'pi vastuni /  pratītyasambhavasyārthamavijñaḥ sa na paśyati // Pshk_6 //

src_original: nāpaneyamataḥ kiñcitprakṣepyaṃ nāpi kiñcana /

src_original: tena muninoddiṣṭāḥ kathitāḥ prakāśitā iti paryāyāḥ /
tgt_original: 彼牟尼所演、宣暢辯說，是名假名。

src_original: te ca na prakṛtiniyatipuruṣaparādhīnakarmaīśvarakālasvabhāvayathecchāprajāpatiyadṛcchādikāraṇaprasūtāḥ /  kiṃ tarhi pratītyasambhūtāḥ /

src_original: te dvādaśāṅgaviśeṣāḥ kleśakarmaduḥkhā anyonyaṃ pratītya naḍakalāpayogena triṣu yathāvat saṃkṣiptāḥ /

tgt_original: 何者為煩惱、何者為業、何者為苦，而得有此諸因緣法勝分攝成？ 答曰：

src_original: dvādaśāṅgaviśeṣāṇāṃ[madhye] ādyā avidyā,  aṣṭamī tṛṣṇā,  navamamupādānam ime trayaḥ kleśasaṅgṛhītāḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ / kiṃ karma /
tgt_original: 於此十二勝上分中，初為無明、第八為愛、第九為取，此三勝分是煩惱所攝；

src_original: ca śabdaḥ priyaviyogāpriyasaṃyogeṣṭavighātaduḥkhāni sañcinoti /

src_original: tribhyā bhavati dvandvam kleśākhyebhyastribhyaḥ karmākhyaṃ dvandvamutpadyate /

src_original: traya udbhavanti kleśākhyāḥ /  tebhyastribhyaḥ kleśebhyaśca dvandvamutpadyate /

src_original: bhavāḥ kāmarūpārūpyasaṃśabditāḥ /  [te ca] anavasthānāccakrabhūtāḥ /

src_original: teṣu pṛthagjano loka eva paribhramati /  tuśabdaśca aniyatajñāpanārthaḥ /  yathā cakramanupūrvyāṃ paribhramati /

src_original: pṛcchati / atha sarvadeheśvaraḥ sattvākhyaḥ kartā /

src_original: hetuphalañca hi jagat prajñaptiṃ vihāya anyo nāsti kaścidiha sattvaḥ /  paramārthataḥ kalpitaḥ /  kalpitaśca nāsti /  kalpitamātraviṣaye(kāma)
tgt_original: 答曰： 偈言「一切世間法，唯因果無人，除假說故有，此是正思量。

src_original: pṛcchati / yadyevam,
tgt_original: 問曰：

src_original: tarhi asmāllokāt kaḥ paralokaṃ saṅkrāmati /

src_original: teṃ kleśakarmaduḥkheṣu saṅgṛhītāstriṣu[yathāvan] // Pshk_1 //

src_original: tatra daśa ca dvau ca dvādaśa /
tgt_original: 是中十及二，　　故曰為十二，

src_original: yathā gurumukhāduccaritāḥ tathā maraṇāṃśikacittamapi /  śāśvata[ākhya] doṣaḥ syāt paraloke na saṅkramaḥ /

src_original: paraloko 'pi nānyato bhavati /  ahetudoṣasattvāt /

src_original: tathā /  yathā pradīpātpradīpaḥ,  mukhāt darpaṇe pratibimbamutpadyate /  mudrātaḥ pratimudrotpadyate /  arkakāntādagniḥ bījādaṅkuraphalāni amlarasāt rasavatpunaḥ,  śabdātpratiśrutkaścotpadyate /

src_original: skandhapratisandhirasaṅkramaśca vidvadbhiravadhāryau // Pshk_5 //

src_original: tato nivartayitavyam /  anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmabhāvān na nityabhāvān vyāmuhyāt /
tgt_original: 以是義故，一切世間無常、不淨、苦、無我等。

src_original: asati vyāmohe na rāgaḥ /  asati rāge na dveṣaḥ /  asati dveṣe na karma karoti /  asati karmaṇi nopādīyate bhāvaḥ /  asatyupādāne na bhavamabhisaṃskaroti /  asati bhave na jātiḥ /
tgt_original: 以能觀察如是事故，於諸法中不生疑惑，不疑惑故則不生染，不生染故則不生著，不生著故則不虛渴，不虛渴故則不造業，以無業故則不取事，不取事故不造有為行，無有為行故則不復生，以不生故無有一切身心等苦。

src_original: asatyāṃ jātau na kāyacittayorduḥkhaṃ bhaveta /  evamacintyāt taddhetupañcakānnānyatphalamutpadyate /  ayaṃ mokṣo veditavyaḥ /
